job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <strong><u>Job Description<br><br></u></strong>Ensure production reliability, quality for our suite of applications by working with SRE and support engineers<br><br>Understand functional/technical implementation of our apps and setup proactive alerts based on that to avoid user impact<br><br>Organize/Lead incident free deployments with thorough scrutiny working with ops, support, engineering and SRE teams<br><br>Continously evaluate user traffic, usage patterns , system performance and derive plans for optimization accordingly<br><br>Manage and drive critical incidents to resolution without delays by working with all involved internal teams/external teams with prioritizing customer impact always<br><br>Must be an expert in Splunk, AppDynamics, Linux and related scripting<br><br>Experience in systems both on-premise (data center) and on public cloud (AWS, GCP etc)<br><br>Excellent troubleshooting and problem solving skills
